response:

question: I need help with my English paper
response:

question: Middletown campus research help
response:
For research assistance on the Middletown campus, you can reach out to the Gardner‐Harvey Library’s outreach librarian:  
• **Jessie Long**, **Principal Librarian & Outreach and Instruction Librarian, Gardner-Harvey Library** (Middletown campus)  
• View her Faculty Services & Publishing & Research Support guide: https://libguides.lib.miamioh.edu/publishing  

If you’d like broader research support or need to connect with another librarian, please visit https://www.lib.miamioh.edu/research/resea
